title: BRIEF-Triangle Energy (Global) Gets Notice From Key Petroleum (Australia) On Farmout Agreement Termination
text:
BRIEF-Triangle Energy (Global) Gets Notice From Key Petroleum (Australia) On Farmout Agreement Termination

Stock Markets 49 minutes ago (Sep 17, 2019 08:51)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Triangle Energy (Global) Gets Notice From Key Petroleum (Australia) On Farmout Agreement Termination Sept 17 (Reuters) - Triangle Energy (Global) Ltd : * RECEIVED NOTICE FROM KEY PETROLEUM (AUSTRALIA) PURPORTING TO TERMINATE FARMOUT AGREEMENT FOR PRODUCTION LICENCE L7 * CO SEEKING LEGAL ADVICE ON MATTER; INTENDS TO VIGOROUSLY DEFEND ITS RIGHTS AS TO VALIDITY OF PURPORTED TERMINATION.

BRIEF-Triangle Energy (Global) Gets Notice From Key Petroleum (Australia) On Farmout Agreement Termination
description: BRIEF-Triangle Energy (Global) Gets Notice From Key Petroleum (Australia) On Farmout Agreement Termination
